duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, administer, and maintain a comprehensive security program in compliance with government regulations and internal policies.
Provide security guidance regarding program operation and ensure compliance with applicable government and company regulations.
Create, update, and administer security education, training, and awareness programs for program participants.
Conduct self-inspections, implement corrective actions, and oversee government inspections to ensure program compliance.
Manage special access program facility administration in compliance with security directives and physical security requirements.
Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders across multiple organization levels and program sites.

education_certification.credential: University Degree or equivalent experience and minimum 5 years prior relevant experience, or Advanced Degree in a related field and minimum 3 years' experience
